He had quite a few girls he would say that to.
I know, I thought so pretty much, you know.
He had quite a few girls he would say that to. But,
When did you, when was the last time you saw him?
Um before la - before the summer.
May or June? When you gave the car back, or sometime before you graduated?
//Probably, mhm.
Wh, when did that incident
//Or maybe a little after I graduated. I don't remember.
When did that incident happen when he bent you over the table?
I don't remember.
Was it recent or was it like a year ago?
It was probably in like, somewhere in the middle or, of the time that I worked there. It was definitely before December, if that's what you're trying to get at.
Were you seventeen when you did that too?
Oh, yeah, I was definitely. Definitely.
Okay, we're gonna get to that in just a minute. Getting back to when you were naked,
UI
And you were providing the massages.
And they were - and they were legitimate massages, by the way - I don't want to be in trouble for anything I didn't
//No no, I'm telling you, you are not a suspect in this in any way, shape or form.
